::Halucigen::
Slowly the floor beneth him melted away until suddenly it broke 
sending Halucigen down out of the room.

(Where is he, like on a ground floor or in a airbase or what?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> this solution you found is so ridiculous that I won't argue with 
it, in fact
> it could be rather humorous.
> 
> Ignatius heard a voice in the room, somehow one of the bots were 
speaking.
> "Who said that? he asked becoming a little more paranoid. "I'll 
find you and
> when I do you will never speak again." the voice had to be there 
somewhere.
> He didn't know how they'd avoided the Stasis field but there would 
be
> ramifications.
> 
> A smell of burning metal was scanned by the computer, "Something 
seems
> amiss, I scan something burning." the floor was melting slowly but 
Ignatius
> was again getting paniced by the situation.

moving.  He

with or

couldn't

art of
